title: plat decay
body:
Hi,
I logged into my account today and i was warned about decaying from plat 5 in 9 days. Obviously, because i havent played recently. However, i played a ranked game after seeing this and won and logged out. I came back on later today and the same messaged popped up claiming id decay in 8 days? So how is this possible, if i played a ranked game shouldn't it have recognized it and reset? Could somebody help me, thx

replies.body:
It looks like you played a flex rank game that you won. 
You need to play a soloq game since that is the plat rank eligible to decay (your last soloq game was 20 days ago).
oh you're right, hahahaha. I was certain that it was solo queue, but i must have just unnoticeably  clicked flex as ranked would have been down at the time i was playing. Thanks for telling me haha!
